events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated and the package is overdue.
The customer reported a shipping delay with no recent tracking updates on their package ordered two weeks ago.
Assigning the case to the delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status with the carrier?
Sure, my order number is 789654321 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield, IL.
I have contacted the courier service and they reported a delay due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within 3 more days.
I’m disappointed that it will take even longer, but I appreciate the update. I really needed the item sooner.
Escalating your case to a supervisor for priority handling given the extended delay and your urgency.
Your package was delivered earlier today. Please confirm receipt and let us know if everything is in order.
Following up to ensure you have received your order and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your delivery has been successfully received, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
